# Draft:Cori Howard

----
Cori Howard is a Canadian journalist, essayist and poet.
Biography
Born in 1970 in Vancouver, British Columbia, Cori Howard was educated at [https://www.torontomu.ca Toronto Metropolitan University] where she received an undergraduate degree in Journalism, with a focus on magazine writing in 1992. She currently works in communications, as well as freelance writing and [https://writersfest.bc.ca/festival-author-2025/cori-howard hosting events] on writing.
Howard was the features reporter for [https://nationalpost.com The National Post] from 1998 to 2001. She has worked as a senior producer for CBC Television and Radio and has published hundreds articles in the New York Times, [https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/soloish/wp/2016/09/27/its-not-safe-to-run-alone-my-friends-say-i-do-it-anyway/ Washington Post,] Real Simple, Canadian Geographic, Reader's Digest, Conde Nast Traveller, Maclean's, Chatelaine, [https://www.theglobeandmail.com/arts/books/article-why-divorce-lit-is-having-a-moment/ The Globe and Mail], Spirituality and Health and many more. She has worked all over the world - from Chile, Costa Rica and Burma - as a freelance correspondent for the San Francisco Chronicle, Vancouver Sun and CBC Television, among others.
Howard's first book, Between Interruptions: Thirty Women Tell the Truth about Motherhood, was published by the now defunct Key Porter Press in 2009. Her poetry has been published in a wide range of journals including [https://static1.squarespace.com/static/637fedf26a76884fff99fa64/t/6830aca6af580a2d087b438e/1748020400952/CV2+poem.jpeg.pdf CV2,] Yellow Arrow Journal, [https://newcritique.co.uk/2024/05/23/poetry-cori-howard/ New Critique Journal] and [https://static1.squarespace.com/static/637fedf26a76884fff99fa64/t/638e81910418b3138afa2922/1670283665761/The+Children+-+FSR.pdf Fieldstone Review].
[https://caitlinpress.com/Books/T/The-Fifth-Season The Fifth Season] is her first poetry collection, to be published by [https://caitlinpress.com Caitlin Press] in 2026.
Selected works
